pages.title: Upgraded Tesla Coils
pages.text: <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/alchemy)Alchemy/$ unlocks several upgraded <item>$(l:essentials:fluid/tesla)tesla coil tops/$, which can be used on top of a <item>$(l:essentials:fluid/tesla)tesla coil/$.$(br2)There are 5 variants. Some have slightly different stats, while 2 do something completely different from transferring FE.$(br2)
The <item>Offensive Tesla Coil Head/$ does not transfer FE, and will instead attack entities within range with 5 electric damage. It will also attack players, including the owner.$(br2)
The <item>Decorative Tesla Coil Head/$ does not transfer FE, and will instead drain FE to shoot decorative electric bolts around it.$(br2)
The <item>Long-Range Tesla Coil Head/$ has a transfer range of 32 blocks.$(br2)
The <item>Efficient Tesla Coil Head/$ has no FE loss from transfer.$(br2)

The <item>High-Intensity Tesla Coil Head/$ will transfer 10,000FE per jolt, effectively having 10x the normal FE transfer rate. It will not work without a <item>$(l:essentials:fluid/tesla)leyden jar/$ installed in the <item>$(l:essentials:fluid/tesla)tesla coil/$.$(br2)
